sn22.133:4.4: “Reverend Koṭṭhita, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.133:4.6: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.133:5.1: “Reverend, an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.133:5.7: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
sn22.133:6.1: When he said this, Venerable Sāriputta said to him:
sn22.133:6.2: “Reverend Koṭṭhita, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.133:6.4: And how is an knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.133:7.1: “Reverend, an educated noble disciple truly understands the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.133:7.7: And this is how an knowledgeable person is defined.”
